Still great television show after all these years!
All formula but so what?  It's Perry Mason after-all.  And they are sooo entertaining....aaah!  Perry wins again.

Poisoned Pen - An edge-of-your-seat mystery with an unexpected ending punch.
Desperate Deception - Ahhh Gay Paree - adds to history.
i love all Perry  mason movies the product was great and the delivery was fast

This is the one and only one movie where Raymond Burr swings into physical action.  At the end of Heartbroken Bride, as one of the bad guys rushes the witness stand, Burr does a side step take down on the guy and yes, I'm certain just about everyone is going to say this was done by a stuntman although it would be nice if it came out that Burr really did the stunt.  Anyway, it was really worth getting this DVD.
EXCELLENT
